text: Robert Earl is the founder and CEO of Planet Hollywood International, Inc. Robert Earl may also refer to: * Robert Earl (judge) (1824–1902), Chief Judge of the NY Court of Appeals * Robert Earl (singer) (born 1926), English singer * Robert Earl (U.S. Marine), United States Marine lieutenant colonel * Bob Earl (born 1950), American racing driver * Rob Earl, member of The Medway Poets * Robbie Earl (born 1985), American ice hockey player ==See also== * Robert Earle (disambiguation) * Robert Earl Keen (born 1956), American singer- songwriter and entertainer
title: Robert Earl (disambiguation)
